00001 /**************************************************************************
00002 $Header: KEYS.C Fri 11-06-2000 9:36:10 pm HvA V1.00 $
00003 ***************************************************************************/
00004 
00005 #include <bios.h>
00006 #include "keys.h"
00007 
00008 /*+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
00009 key_pressed() checks the status of the keyboard by means of
00010 bioskey(x) function. If a key was pressed it returns TRUE, else it
00011 returns (FALSE). Note that the keypress is not dequeued for the
00012 buffer. 
00013 ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++*/
00014 int key_pressed()
00015 {
00016   if (bioskey(1)) {
00017     wn_log("key_pressed() TRUE\n");
00018     wn_log("TRUE \n");
00019     return(TRUE);
00020   }
00021   return(FALSE);
00022 }
00023 
00024 /*+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
00025 shift_status returns the state of the shift state with bioskey(2)
00026 ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++*/
00027 unsigned char shift_status()
00028 {
00029   return(bioskey(2));
00030 }
00031 
00032 /*+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
00033 waitkey() waits for a keypress. If a key is pressed, it will return
00034 the scancode in case of a special key, or the ASCII value (that is,
00035 the scancode & 0x00FF)
00036 ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++*/
00037 unsigned int waitkey()
00038 {
00039   unsigned int scancode;
00040 
00041   wn_log("waitkey()\n");
00042 
00043   /*--- Wait for a keypress  */
00044   while (!key_pressed());
00045   
00046   scancode = bioskey(0x10);
00047   wn_log("scancode = %0lx\n",scancode);
00048   return(scancode);
00049 }
00050 
00051 /*+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
00052 is_fkey() if the parameter is the scancode of a function key.
00053 If so, this function returns TRUE, else it returns FALSE. 
00054 ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++*/
00055 int is_fkey(unsigned int scancode)
00056 {
00057   switch (scancode) {
00058         /*--- F1...F12  */
00059     case        0x3B00 :
00060     case        0x3C00 :
00061     case        0x3D00 :
00062     case        0x3E00 :
00063     case        0x3F00 :
00064     case        0x4000 :
00065     case        0x4100 :
00066     case        0x4200 :
00067     case        0x4300 :
00068     case        0x4400 :
00069     case        0x8500 :
00070     case        0x8600 :
00071     /*--- Shift F1..F2  */      
00072     case        0x5400 :
00073     case        0x5500 :
00074     case        0x5600 :
00075     case        0x5700 :
00076     case        0x5800 :
00077     case        0x5900 :
00078     case        0x5A00 :
00079     case        0x5B00 :
00080     case        0x5C00 :
00081     case        0x5D00 :
00082     case        0x8700 :
00083     case        0x8800 :
00084     /*--- CTRL F1..F12  */            
00085     case        0x5E00 :
00086     case        0x5F00 :
00087     case        0x6000 :
00088     case        0x6100 :
00089     case        0x6200 :
00090     case        0x6300 :
00091     case        0x6400 :
00092     case        0x6500 :
00093     case        0x6600 :
00094     case        0x6700 :
00095     case        0x8900 :
00096     case        0x8A00 :
00097     /*---  ALT F1..F12  */            
00098     case        0x6800 :
00099     case        0x6900 :
00100     case        0x6A00 :
00101     case        0x6B00 :
00102     case        0x6C00 :
00103     case        0x6D00 :
00104     case        0x6E00 :
00105     case        0x6F00 :
00106     case    0x7000 :
00107         case    0x7100 :
00108         case    0x8B00 :
00109         case    0x8C00 : return TRUE;
00110         default        : return FALSE;
00111   }     
00112 }
